timeline.bodyText: There is no need to call toString. If limitType is null, you would have a NullPointerException whereas it works perfectly without it
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.bodyText:
Great: you put an exemple of what I said just before!
Simply write something like this :  + ", side: " + this.side
timeline.author: mathbagu
